abstract: Nuclear Regulatory Commission issues operating license for Spring City, Tenn, nuclear reactor, making it first new nuclear plant in country in 21st century.
lead_paragraph: The Spring City reactor, which will be the nation’s first new nuclear generating plant of the 21st century, has received the go-ahead from the federal government.

headline.main: Tennessee: First Nuclear Plant of the 21st Century Is Licensed
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: First Nuclear Plant of the 21st Century Is Licensed

snippet: The Spring City reactor, which will be the nation’s first new nuclear generating plant of the 21st century, has received the go-ahead from the federal government.
